availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff. Virginia native. Married to Susan Berry Parish in Madison County on November 26, 1818. Father of Ann E. Parish and Samuel Parish. Resident of Madison County, Kentucky in 1830. Owned five enslaved persons in Madison County in 1830. Farmer in Madison County in 1850. Owned seven enslaved persons in 1850. Sheriff in Madison County in 1864.

ab.bibl:

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. X
